    Gets the board object specified by id

    Returns total number of pixels attached to this output expander board
    String getPortName()  
    void setBrightness​(float bri)
    Sets brightness for this port and all boards and channels connnected to it.
    void setColorCorrection​(float r, float g, float b)
    Sets r,g and b color correction factors - values in the range 0..1 that will be multiplied with pixel colors to produce the particular 'white' you want to match.
    void setDrawMode​(DrawMode dm)
    Sets pixel drawing mode, either DrawMode.FAST (brightness & gamma adjustment only) or DrawMode.ENHANCED (brightness, gamma, color correction, color depth expansion if supported by LEDs).
    void setGammaCorrection​(float g)
    Sets gamma correction factor (power curve exponenent) for this port and and all boards and channels connected to it.

  • Method Details

    • getPortName

      public String getPortName()

    • addOutputExpander

      public PBXBoard addOutputExpander​(int boardNo)
      Create a new board, attach it to this port and return the object. Board number is the hardwired board id on the bus. Setting a board to an ID other than zero requires physically cutting a trace on the board.
      Parameters:
      boardNo - - id of the board, 0-7
      Returns:
      new PBXBoard object

    • getBoard

      public PBXBoard getBoard​(int id)
      Gets the board object specified by id
      Parameters:
      id - - board id number to retrieve
      Returns:
      PBXBoard object if found, null otherwise

    • getChannelList

      public LinkedList<PBXBoard> getChannelList()
      Gets the list of output expander boards associated with this port. The list may be empty.
      Returns:
      board list

    • setGammaCorrection

      public void setGammaCorrection​(float g)
      Sets gamma correction factor (power curve exponenent) for this port and and all boards and channels connected to it. Settings made at the port level will override previous settings for attached boards and channels.
      Parameters:
      g - global gamma factor (0..1)

    • setBrightness

      public void setBrightness​(float bri)
      Sets brightness for this port and all boards and channels connnected to it. Settings made at the port level will override previous settings for attached boards and channels.
      Parameters:
      b - (0..1) brightness

    • setColorCorrection

      public void setColorCorrection​(float r, float g, float b)
      Sets r,g and b color correction factors - values in the range 0..1 that will be multiplied with pixel colors to produce the particular 'white' you want to match. Settings made at the port level will override previous settings for all attached boards and channels.

    • setDrawMode

      public void setDrawMode​(DrawMode dm)
      Sets pixel drawing mode, either DrawMode.FAST (brightness & gamma adjustment only) or DrawMode.ENHANCED (brightness, gamma, color correction, color depth expansion if supported by LEDs). DrawMode can be changed at any time. Settings made at the port level will override previous settings for attached boards and channels.

    • getPixelCount

      public int getPixelCount()
      Returns total number of pixels attached to this output expander board
      Returns:
